name: personal-relationship-manager-ui
description: Warm and thoughtful UI for managing personal relationships

scripts.build: bash -c 'set -euo pipefail; rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && if [ -f index.html ]; then cp index.html dist/index.html; fi && if [ -f styles.css ]; then cp styles.css dist/styles.css; fi && for asset in app.js script.js main.js; do if [ -f "$asset" ]; then cp "$asset" "dist/$asset"; fi; done'
